amendment.description: To prohibit the use of appropriated amounts by DOGE.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1272, under the order of 3/14/2025, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 131.

action.text: Amendment SA 1272 proposed by Senator Van Hollen.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1272 proposed by Senator Van Hollen.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1272, under the order of 3/14/2025, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 131.
